fields.value: Replication Data for: "IS HEALTH CARE INFECTED BY BAUMOL’S COST DISEASE? TEST OF A NEW MODEL"

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset contains all the materials needed to reproduce the results in "IS HEALTH CARE INFECTED BY BAUMOL’S COST DISEASE? TEST OF A NEW MODEL", which is coauthored with Akinwande Atanda and Andrea Menclova. All results were produced using STATA. The description provided for each file should be self-explanatory, but the README file may be read if necessary.

files.description: This is the main dataset. It is used to generate the results in TABLES 1-4 and the figures in the paper. It is to be used with the following do files: FIGURES and TABLES 1-4. Ignore the error message that says "The file is not in a STATA format that we can read or support." It downloads just fine!
files.label: BCD_dataset_09_11_2017.dta

dataFile.description: This is the main dataset. It is used to generate the results in TABLES 1-4 and the figures in the paper. It is to be used with the following do files: FIGURES and TABLES 1-4. Ignore the error message that says "The file is not in a STATA format that we can read or support." It downloads just fine!

files.description: This dataset is one of two datasets used for TABLE 5. It is to be used with the do file TABLE5top. Ignore the error message that says "The file is not in a STATA format that we can read or support." It downloads just fine!
files.label: BEA_BCD_Dataset_stata.dta

dataFile.description: This dataset is one of two datasets used for TABLE 5. It is to be used with the do file TABLE5top. Ignore the error message that says "The file is not in a STATA format that we can read or support." It downloads just fine!

files.description: This do file produces the figures in the paper. It is to be used with the dataset BCD_dataset_09_11_2017.
files.label: FIGURES.do

dataFile.description: This do file produces the figures in the paper. It is to be used with the dataset BCD_dataset_09_11_2017.

files.description: This do file produces some additional tests (PURT, tests for slope homogeneity, and tests for cointegration) not reported in the paper. It uses the dataset BCD_dataset_09_11_2017.
files.label: OnlineAppendix.do

dataFile.description: This do file produces some additional tests (PURT, tests for slope homogeneity, and tests for cointegration) not reported in the paper. It uses the dataset BCD_dataset_09_11_2017.

files.description: This appendix reports some additional test results (PURTs, tests for slope homogeneity, tests for cointegration) that are not included in the paper
files.label: ONLINE APPENDIX.docx

dataFile.description: This appendix reports some additional test results (PURTs, tests for slope homogeneity, tests for cointegration) that are not included in the paper

files.description: This is the output file that corresponds to the do file OnlineAppendix.
files.label: OnlineAppendix.smcl

dataFile.description: This is the output file that corresponds to the do file OnlineAppendix.

files.description: This WORD doc contains instructions for how  to replicate all the results in the paper.
files.label: README.doc

dataFile.description: This WORD doc contains instructions for how  to replicate all the results in the paper.
